title: Tom Saunders
text:
I’m passionate about equipping researchers with the skills they need to achieve greater impact.
I plan, coordinate, and teach training workshops on programming, managing research data, and specialist research software.
I’m currently learning how to use  and Quarto  to visualise and interpret data.
I believe improving uptake of digital research skills, while encouraging openness and reproducibility, will have a transformational effect on research and innovation.
